sec.title: Ethics approval and consent to participate
sec.p: This study was approved by the Human Ethics Committees of the Guangdong General Hospital. The patient and donor gave their written informed consent in accordance with the Declaration of Helsinki. This study is registered at www.ClinicalTrials.gov as NCT02822326. All animal experimental protocols were performed in accordance with instruction guidelines from the China Council on Animal Care and approved by the guidelines of the Ethics Committee of Animal Experiments at Guangzhou Institutes of Biomedicine and Health (GIBH).
